[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#434552″ custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”||1.6%||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This is the place where you’ll find audio downloads – guided imagination journeys, and lectures on myth and fairy tales – for sale. I’m slowly adding to the titles here; please sign up to my newsletter (at the bottom of the page) to be kept informed when new work becomes available.

I don’t usually sell my own books, but from time to time I’ll have limited numbers of signed copies and first editions available for sale here. Again, if you’re signed up to my newsletter, you’ll be the first to know when I put them up.

Enchanted Journeys

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”21px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”10px|40px|0px|40px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A collection of 13 guided imagination audio journeys

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘Enchanted Journeys’ is a collection of thirteen audio files, each of which offers a guided imagination journey around 25 – 30 minutes long, narrated by Dr Sharon Blackie and priced at £18 for the collection.

All of these meditations are designed to help you to work with your deep imagination, engage with the imaginal world and develop resources for activating your mythic imagination.

COURTING THE WORLD SOUL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Courting the World Soul is an on-demand, self-study foundation course in cultivating the mythic imagination.

– learn practical techniques to create a grounded, embodied practice 

– uncover the mythic themes and archetypes which are active in your life

– understand your own individual mythopoetic journey through this life, and the unique gift you bring to this world, at this time

Find out more

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/red-deer-SQ.jpg” title_text=”red-deer-SQ” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”40px|40px|0px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”10px|40px|0px|40px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THIS MYTHIC LIFE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our old Western traditions tell us that it’s through exercising the embodied and emplaced imagination – through working with myth, archetypes, dreams, fairy tales, and through exploring creative and expressive practices – that we can come to understand our unique gift and purpose, and weave ourselves back into the web of life on this beautiful, animate Earth.

This Mythic Life, then, is a unique on-demand, self-study course which guides you to revive these old enchantments, and unlock the magic of the everyday.

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”onlinecourses” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#434552″ custom_padding=”||80px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”38px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HAGITUDE: limited EDITION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”37px|||||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This limited printing of Hagitude comes as a luxury slipcased hardback with a unique design and exclusive content – a new and original story. Each copy is signed and numbered. 

Also included is a numbered, limited edition A5 art print (unframed) by artist Natalie Eslick, which features a beautiful portrait of Old Crane Woman.

THIS MYTHIC LIFE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our old Western traditions tell us that it’s through exercising the embodied and emplaced imagination – through working with myth, archetypes, dreams, fairy tales, and through exploring creative and expressive practices – that we can come to understand our unique gift and purpose, and weave ourselves back into the web of life on this beautiful, animate Earth.

This Mythic Life, then, is a unique on-demand, self-study course which guides you to revive these old enchantments, and unlock the magic of the everyday.

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.1″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: ShopBooks and audio downloadsThis is the place where you’ll find audio downloads – guided imagination journeys, and lectures on myth and fairy tales – for sale. I’m slowly adding to the titles here; please sign up to my newsletter (at the bottom of the page) to be kept informed when new work becomes available. I […]
